name: Daniel Park
summary: I am a human-centric backend engineer who believes that the true value of technology lies in the lives it touches. While tools can generate code, I focus on designing trust.
about_en: To me, backend development is not just about writing efficient logic, it is about architecting a reliable backbone that protects the stories and data of the people who use it.
highlights: Specialized in Node.js, Python, Rust, Next.js, AWS
